spells.name: Bane
spells.description: Enemies take -1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

spells.name: Bless
spells.description: Allies gain +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

spells.name: Bless Water
spells.description: Makes holy water.

spells.name: Cause Fear
spells.description: One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.

spells.name: Command
spells.description: One subject obeys selected command for 1 round.

spells.name: Comprehend Languages
spells.description: You understand all spoken and written languages.

spells.name: Cure Light Wounds
spells.description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level (max +5).

spells.name: Curse Water
spells.description: Makes unholy water.

spells.name: Deathwatch
spells.description: Reveals how near death subjects within 30 ft. are.

spells.name: Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
spells.description: Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

spells.name: Detect Undead
spells.description: Reveals undead within 60 ft.

spells.name: Divine Favor
spells.description: You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls.

spells.name: Doom
spells.description: One subject takes -2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

spells.name: Endure Elements
spells.description: Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.

spells.name: Entropic Shield
spells.description: Ranged attacks against you have 20% miss chance.

spells.name: Hide from Undead
spells.description: Undead can't perceive one subject/level.

spells.name: Inflict Light Wounds
spells.description: Touch deals 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).

spells.name: Magic Stone
spells.description: Three stones gain +1 on attack, deal 1d6 +1 damage.

spells.name: Magic Weapon
spells.description: Weapon gains +1 bonus.

spells.name: Obscuring Mist
spells.description: Fog surrounds you.

spells.name: Protection from Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
spells.description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.

spells.name: Remove Fear
spells.description: Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.

spells.name: Sanctuary
spells.description: Opponents can't attack you, and you can't attack.

spells.name: Shield of Faith
spells.description: Aura grants +2 or higher deflection bonus.

spells.name: Summon Monster I
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.
